column4: I've been trying to fuckin fdisk the drive, and I've tried gparted, it doesnt show up in gparted and fdisk says unable to open
all I want is for the bastard to mount to my home directory so I can copy stuff to it
so basicly I'm installing a new fuckin hard drive and have no idea where to start, I think... is there a guide for that?
just remember to set the jumper to slave
